metadata.title: CVE-2020-24972 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The Kleopatra component before 3.1.12 (and before 20.07.80) for GnuPGallows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code because openpgp4fpr: URLsare supported without safe handling of command-line options. The Qtplatformpluginpath command-line option can be used to load an arbitraryDLL.

criterions.comment: kleopatra: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
